${modID}:Turret.NAME: Turret
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn #yConsume 1: deal #b!P! damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Deal #b!E! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Miner.NAME: Miner
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of turn Add #b!P! #yMaterial to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Add #b!E! #yMaterial to your hand.

${modID}:LandMine.NAME: Land Mine
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn if any enemy intends to attack, #yEvoke this. NL Evoke: Deal #b!E! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain #b!B! Block.
